sqlReaderQuery.value:
select d.* , s.* 
FROM sqlserver_conf s
INNER JOIN Data_Load_Ref_Table d
ON s.Source_Name_Conf = d.Source_Name
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Copy_act_Component] cc
ON cc.S_No = d.S_No
WHERE Target_Type = 'ADLS2'

properties.description: It's has configuration to Load Multiple Tables data at dynamic level by passing file as source.
It's has configuration to Load Single Table data at dynamic level.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select d.* 
FROM Data_Load_Ref_Table d
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Copy_act_Component] cc
ON cc.S_No = d.S_No
WHERE Copy_Model = 'FileSystem_ADLS2'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select d.* , s.* 
FROM sqlserver_conf s
INNER JOIN Data_Load_Ref_Table d
ON s.Source_Name_Conf = d.Source_Name
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Copy_act_Component] cc
ON d.S_No = cc.S_No
WHERE Target_Type = 'FileSystem'
